messages.message: From a 50,000 ft view are we thinking about storing more on users? Bookmarks seems to be the first foray into the concept of individual customization of the actual platform. Curious to see if we are thinking about other initiatives in this space at all.

@Heymian has set up the databases to make this possible! :sparkles: She already has it set up to store the grid vs list view settings in launcher that are currently in local storage, and we were also thinking about desktop wallpaper, display names... and whatever else you think could go in there!
hahah yup! let us know if you have more ideas for what you think is useful!
This is amazing! I will be drumming up stuff for sure knowing we now have this capability!
Weâ€™ll soon have systems repo and users can use that to store things
